parameters.name: appArn
parameters.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Resilience Hub application. The format for this ARN is: arn: partition:resiliencehub: region: account:app/ app-id. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference guide.

nested_items.name: appArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Resilience Hub application. The format for this ARN is: arn: partition:resiliencehub: region: account:app/ app-id. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference guide.

nested_items.name: assessmentSchedule
nested_items.description: Assessment execution schedule with --Daily' or --Disabled' values.

nested_items.name: awsApplicationArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of Resource Groups group that is integrated with an AppRegistry application. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference guide.

nested_items.name: complianceStatus
nested_items.description: Current status of compliance for the resiliency policy.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: Date and time when the application was created.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: Optional description for an application.

nested_items.name: driftStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates if compliance drifts (deviations) were detected while running an assessment for your application.

nested_items.name: eventSubscriptions
nested_items.description: The list of events you would like to subscribe and get notification for. Currently, Resilience Hub supports notifications only for Drift detected and Scheduled assessment failure events.

nested_items.name: eventType
nested_items.description: The type of event you would like to subscribe and get notification for. Currently, Resilience Hub supports notifications only for Drift detected ( DriftDetected) and Scheduled assessment failure ( ScheduledAssessmentFailure) events.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Unique name to identify an event subscription.

nested_items.name: snsTopicArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Simple Notification Service topic. The format for this ARN is: arn:partition:sns:region:account:topic-name. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference guide.

nested_items.name: lastAppComplianceEvaluationTime
nested_items.description: Date and time the most recent compliance evaluation.

nested_items.name: lastDriftEvaluationTime
nested_items.description: Indicates the last time that a drift was evaluated.

nested_items.name: lastResiliencyScoreEvaluationTime
nested_items.description: Date and time the most recent resiliency score evaluation.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Name for the application.

nested_items.name: permissionModel
nested_items.description: Defines the roles and credentials that Resilience Hub would use while creating the application, importing its resources, and running an assessment.

nested_items.name: crossAccountRoleArns
nested_items.description: Defines a list of role Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) to be used in other accounts. These ARNs are used for querying purposes while importing resources and assessing your application.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: invokerRoleName
nested_items.description: Existing Amazon Web Services IAM role name in the primary Amazon Web Services account that will be assumed by Resilience Hub Service Principle to obtain a read-only access to your application resources while running an assessment.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Defines how Resilience Hub scans your resources. It can scan for the resources by using a pre-existing role in your Amazon Web Services account, or by using the credentials of the current IAM user.

nested_items.name: policyArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resiliency policy. The format for this ARN is: arn: partition:resiliencehub: region: account:resiliency-policy/ policy-id. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference guide.

nested_items.name: resiliencyScore
nested_items.description: Current resiliency score for the application.

nested_items.name: rpoInSecs
nested_items.description: Recovery Point Objective (RPO) in seconds.

nested_items.name: rtoInSecs
nested_items.description: Recovery Time Objective (RTO) in seconds.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Status of the application.
(string) ---
(string) ---
